name: Athis

aspects.high_concept: Dunmer Duelist Who Earned a Place in Jorrvaskr
other_aspects: Honor Has Rules (Even If Nords Pretend It Doesn't)

stunts: Dunmer Duelist: +2 to Fight when facing a single named opponent in a formal or personal duel.
Ashland Patience: +2 to Will when resisting fear, intimidation, or supernatural 'pressure.'
Cold Read: Use Notice instead of Empathy to detect lies and tells (social Overcome).
notes: Athis is quieter than most Companions and twice as observant. He's the type who listens while the mead hall boasts. His arc: proving that 'belonging' isn't bloodline, it's oath. He can become a stabilizing influence when the Hall threatens to fracture into ideology.

relationships.Kodlak Whitemane: Respects his honor; cautious optimism about the Purity Path.
relationships.Vilkas: Mutual respect through discipline; both value standards.
relationships.Aela the Huntress: Keeps distance; admires skill, distrusts ideology.
relationships.the player character: Sees a leader in him; tests if the 'saga' hides a mind.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Measured, dry, sometimes cutting; speaks less, means more.
motivations: Earn respect that can't be taken away
Settle an old debt from his past (hook)
fears: The Companions becoming a cult of impulse
quirks: Stands where he can see doors

romance_arc.conflict: He doesn't believe 'home' is real until it survives a crisis.

recruitment.greeting: If you're leaving Whiterun, I'll come. Better than sitting in stories.

story_hooks: Athis has intel routes in Windhelm and Riften that can connect to the main plot.
Athis becomes a 'bridge companion' when dealing with Dunmer/outsider communities.
He can be the first to notice a betrayal plot against the player character inside Whiterun.
